reviewText: Horrible.  Boring.  Not at all mysterious, horrifying, funny, thrilling.  Just plain dreadful movie with a ham actor playing a ham actor.  Poor Ray Milland plays a very insubstantial role really; his best scene is in the Pretty Little Doll song, wearing creepy makeup and behaving like a puppet on a string.  Don't waste your time with this.

A different kind of horror film that didn`t strike me as being all that funny, maybe because I`m not a Brit.  Quite enjoyable and interesting on the whole.  Good quality picture and sound on this region 2 DVD.  Contains a musical score from the film of 30 minutes as a bonus.
